co.cask.cdap.api.templates

Interface AdapterContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatchContext, BatchSinkContext, BatchSourceContext, MapReduceContext, RealtimeContext, WorkerContext

    @Beta
public interface AdapterContext
    Provides access to template adapter context when a program is executing as an adapter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdapterSpecification getAdapterSpecification()
      Returns the AdapterSpecification containing information about the adapter or null if the program is not running under the adapter context.
      PluginProperties getPluginProperties(String pluginId)
      Gets the PluginProperties associated with the given plugin type and name in the adapter context.
      <T> Class<T> loadPluginClass(String pluginId)
      Loads and returns a plugin class as specified by the given type and name.
      <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId)
      Creates a new instance of a plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdapterSpecification

        @Nullable
AdapterSpecification getAdapterSpecification()
        Returns the AdapterSpecification containing information about the adapter or null if the program is not running under the adapter context.

      • getPluginProperties

        PluginProperties getPluginProperties(String pluginId)
        Gets the PluginProperties associated with the given plugin type and name in the adapter context.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in AdapterConfigurer.
        Returns:
        the PluginProperties.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no plugin for the given type and name
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program is not running under the adapter context

      • loadPluginClass

        <T> Class<T> loadPluginClass(String pluginId)
        Loads and returns a plugin class as specified by the given type and name.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in AdapterConfigurer.
        Returns:
        the resulting plugin Class.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no plugin for the given type and name
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program is not running under the adapter context

      • newPluginInstance

        <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId)
                    throws InstantiationException
        Creates a new instance of a plugin. The instance returned will have the PluginConfig setup with PluginProperties provided at the time when the AdapterPluginRegistry.usePlugin(String, String, String, PluginProperties) was called during the ApplicationTemplate.configureAdapter(String, Object, AdapterConfigurer) time.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in AdapterConfigurer.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the plugin being specified by the arguments
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - if failed create a new instance.
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program is not running under the adapter context
        IllegalArgumentException - if no plugin for the given type and name
